attributes.action: Save our 20000 troops and historical Regiments.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the MOD CUTS

Its been nearly 100 years since the start of World War 1,  the British Army have suffered significant losses in Wars since.

World War 1 – 886,939 World War 2 - 383,800

Since 1969 in Northern Ireland – 763
Falklands War – 258

Gulf War 1 – 58

72 in the former Yugoslavian countries of Bosnia, Kosovo & Macedonia

Iraq War there was 179
Afghanistan War there is 422 and still rising.

The Government have stated they need to save £38 Billion in the MOD Budget, but yearly they spend £7-£10 Billion on foreign aid & £2 Billion in benefits to Foreign Nationals. This is our money.

82000 troops would not be able to manage in another a major War. This could happen with tensions arising in Argentina, Iran & Syria.

The calculations for the Libyan war put the cost of UK operations at well over £600-million, and arguably into the £1.25-billion-plus range. This has to come out of existing MoD reserves if Ark Royal hadn't been cut we would of saved.
